snippet.title: Sin Squad: Stealth Assassins | Latin American Games Showcase TGA 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Sin Squad: Stealth Assassins
Get ready for a thrilling ride in the dark, gritty world of Sin Squad: Stealth Assassins! This upcoming PC game by Alchemy Games combines intense stealth action with a unique comic book twist. Inspired by iconic comics like Sin City, Whiteout, and Batman: Black and White, the game features striking high-contrast grayscale visuals that bring the story to life in a whole new way.

Obtenlo/Get It/ Obtê-lo/ここで購入:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2638500
